replies.bodyText:
I am creating the one-off pod in the same namespace the test used, also to create the one-off pod with a namespace appended to its name.
So even if there is a problem in one-off pod deletion, when the test runs the cleanup util everything in that test namespace gets wiped out.

replies.bodyText:
The initial implementation was to create a new one-off pod with its own pvc and pv (using the hostPath location from the pv used by the test, where the contents need to be archived are located)
Now I changed the code such that the one-off pod will use the existing pvc/pv used by the test. Mount it under /shared in one-off pod and copy it.
